title: Sophisticated Netherlands Stay in Maastricht Overlooking Picturesque Meuse River
description: Experience a lively Netherlands stay at Crowne Plaza Maastricht, an IHG Hotel, situated on the banks of the Meuse River. This modern base in the heart of the city is the perfect escape near the historic old town and high-end boutiques along Hoogbrugstraat and Rechtstraat. Discover the ancient limestone underground tunnels used in the 13th century and soak in the unique ancestry of the city, then enjoy dinner at the onsite restaurants and bar lounge.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Maastricht, an IHG Hotel

title: Paris-Inspired Heritage Maastricht Escape
description:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of the Dutch city of Maastricht, staying in the heart of it all at Hotel Monastère. This Paris-inspired boutique retreat - housed in a lovingly restored 14th-century monastery - places you in an unbeatable location close to everything this picturesque destination offers. Dubbed one of the most beautiful cities in the Netherlands and famed for its cobbled old town and incredible medieval architecture, Maastricht is a lively university city bejewelled with Gothic churches, dreamy canals and an exciting dining and arts scene.

You’ll love every moment of your Dutch city break at this unique boutique hotel, from the 14th-century architectural elements, including marble fireplaces, high ceilings and brick walls, to the stylish and contemporary Parisian décor. The jewel in the hotel’s crown? Its unbeatable location in the centre of Maastricht, close to the city’s elegant restaurants and quirky boutique shops.
